title: It’s Okay to Be Lost!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Shizuku, are you buying new autumn clothes?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Actually, I’m a bit lost. What did you get, Kasumi-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin got new lipstick and nail polish!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>What kinds? Let me see! Let me see!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uhh...... there’s this one! What do you think? It fits Kasumin perfectly, right~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>That’s a cute color! It’ll look great on you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Shizuko, would you like to try it on?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Um, are you sure?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hey, don’t worry. It’s Kasumin’s, so feel free to try it on~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thanks! Could you take me shopping at other stores too~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
